verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: met] [ARG1: with Republican lawmakers on Capitol Hill] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-PRP: to try and cobble together enough support for an immigration bill amid controversy over the administration 's " zero - tolerance " policy that 's leading to families being separated after illegally crossing the US - Mexico border] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] met with Republican lawmakers on Capitol Hill Tuesday to [V: try] and cobble together [ARG1: enough support for an immigration bill] [ARGM-LOC: amid controversy over the administration 's " zero - tolerance " policy that 's leading to families being separated after illegally crossing the US - Mexico border] .

President Donald Trump met with Republican lawmakers on Capitol Hill Tuesday to try and cobble together enough support for an immigration bill amid controversy over the administration 's " zero - tolerance " policy that [V: 's] leading to families being separated after illegally crossing the US - Mexico border .
